title: Derrick Henry For The Heisman? Not Now. Not Ever.

sentences.d378: Derrick Henry For The Heisman? Not Now. Not Ever.

sentences.971e: Alabama’s “star” RB wants you to think he deserves his sport’s highest award, but what do we really know about him?

sentences.a585: It almost time for college football’s awards season, and you know what that means: ATTACK ADS.

sentences.32f1: As you watch the conference championship games this weekend, brace yourself for more and more spots like this. With gridiron immortality on the line, who knows how dirty things will get before it’s all said and done? As any strategist knows, it’s an ugly but necessary part of any successful campaign …

content: Derrick Henry For The Heisman? Not Now. Not Ever. Alabama’s “star” RB wants you to think he deserves his sport’s highest award, but what do we really know about him? It almost time for college football’s awards season, and you know what that means: ATTACK ADS. As you watch the conference championship games this weekend, brace yourself for more and more spots like this. With gridiron immortality on the line, who knows how dirty things will get before it’s all said and done? As any strategist knows, it’s an ugly but necessary part of any successful campaign …
